basics.name: Jose Manzaneque Ramos
summary: Passionate, energetic and results-oriented engineer experienced in cloud technologies. As I believe that cloud computing represents the heart of digital transformation, my role is to help businesses with their process of change to be more efficient and flexible, both financially and technically. Regarding my previous job experience, I have worked with clients on strategy, planning and providing guidance on technological issues which require a strong understanding of the ICT industry in roles varying from Operations to Sales, managing mission critical systems and driving innovation and technology transformation in global Enterprise client accounts both in Madrid and Silicon Valley.

work.position: S&IT Lead Consultant for Professional Services

work.summary: Operating out of the IBM Almaden Research Center in the San Francisco Bay Area.
highlights: Working on software defined storage/resiliency/networking, cognitive/AI systems, hybrid cloud architecture, hyper-converged infrastructure and monitoring.
Partnering with startups to enhance IBM's offering portfolio and include in IBM's deal pipeline.

work.summary: Managed cloud-based mission critical systems for our customers, many of them leading companies of their industry.
highlights: Built complex systems for mission critical projects, from architecture design to migration planning and continuous operation and improvement.
Analyzed and improved systemsâ€™ performance and scalability and automated systems management.
Responded to incidents, diagnosing their root cause and fixing the underlying problems.

work.summary: Supported Cloud sales in complex solutions by ensuring that the proposed deal included technical solutions that accurately addressed customer needs.
highlights: Engineered and designed the proposal tailored to each customer using Telefonica's Cloud platforms.
Took requirements in order to analyze and draft the technical proposal in RFP/RFIs of Multinational clients.
Architected solutions based on VMware and OpenStack (VDC/Open Cloud).
Provided technical support to the Presales team.
Prepared  PoCs and demos for the Marketing department and final client.
Improved the efficiency of the processes and tools.
Prepared training resources to the whole multinational presales community.
